sentences.en: A small manufacturing sector inhibits growth in the economy.
sentences.cn: 制造业规模太小有碍经济增长.

sentences.en: British manufacturing failed to meet the crisis of the 1970s.
sentences.cn: 英国制造业未能经受住20世纪70年代危机的考验。

sentences.en: Having increased our manufacturing facilities, we are advertising to obtain more users.
sentences.cn: 增加了生产设备以后, 我们做广告争取更多的用户.

sentences.en: Manufacturing fell sharply under the impact of the recession.
sentences.cn: 受到经济萧条的影响,制造业急剧衰退.

sentences.en: Manufacturing industry was worst affected by the fuel shortage.
sentences.cn: 燃料短缺制造业最受到影响.

sentences.en: Manufacturing processes may be affected by the functionality of the product.
sentences.cn: 生产过程可能要受到产品设计目的的影响。

sentences.en: Many jobs in manufacturing were lost during the recession.
sentences.cn: 在经济衰退期，制造业有很多人失业了。

sentences.en: Mining rose by 9.1%, manufacturing by 9.4% and services by 4.3%.
sentences.cn: 采矿业增长了9.1%，制造业增长了9.4%，服务业增长了4.3%。

sentences.en: The entire manufacturing process has been automated.
sentences.cn: 整个生产过程已自动化。

sentences.en: The first three models are being manufactured at the factory in Dayton.
sentences.cn: 最初的3个型号正在代顿的工厂生产。

sentences.en: the impact of the current recession on manufacturing
sentences.cn: 时下经济萎缩对制造业的影响

sentences.en: the introduction of new manufacturing methods
sentences.cn: 新制造方法的采用

sentences.en: The manufacturing economy contracted in October for the sixth consecutive month.
sentences.cn: 10月，制造业经济已经连续第6个月出现萎缩状况。

sentences.en: The manufacturing economy remains on a downswing.
sentences.cn: 制造业持续衰退。

sentences.en: the manufacturing industry
sentences.cn: 制造业

sentences.en: They manufacture the class of plastics known as thermoplastic materials.
sentences.cn: 他们生产被称为热塑材料的塑料类制品。

sentences.en: This concept appears in manufacturing where they count both scrap and inventory.
sentences.cn: 此概念会出现在制造业，在其中会计算废料和存货。

sentences.en: Thousands of jobs had been lost in manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 制造行业已有数以千计的人失业。

sentences.en: To me innovation and manufacturing go together.
sentences.cn: 对我来说制造和创新是相辅相成的。

sentences.en: We were not able to meet the deadline because of manufacturing delays.
sentences.cn: 因为制造方面的延误，我们没能赶上最后期限。

sentences.en: Wilful neglect of our manufacturing industry has caused this problem.
sentences.cn: 故意忽略我们的制造业引起了这个问题。

phrases.tran_cn: 制造设施，生产设施；生产设备
制造过程；制造工艺；生产过程

trans.tran_en: the process or business of producing goods in factories

trans.tran_cn: （大规模）制造( manufacture的现在分词 )，捏造，加工，粗制滥造（文学作品）
trans.tran_en: To manufacture something means to make it in a factory, usually in large quantities
